TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_KalʉvʉngaNgani, title = KalʉvʉngaNgani, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/KalʉvʉngaNgani} }

S.FORM: == Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani == u sulit nu Hulam: 桃源部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Kaohsiung a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani. u kasalumaluma' nu Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani sa, 252 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 825 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 739 ku tademaw, pakalatu 90%. u zuma sa, cay ku yingcumin, 86 ku tademaw, pakalatu 10%. u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 80%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Cou 3%, Laaluwa(Hla'alua) 4%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong太巴塱, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani == o solit no Holam: 桃源部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Kaohsiong a kowan ko niyazo' no Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani. o kasalomaloma' no Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani sa, 252 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 825 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 739 ko tademaw, pakalato 90%. o zoma sa, cay ko yingcomin, 86 ko tademaw, pakalato 10%. o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 80%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Coo 3%, Laalowa(Hla'aloa) 4%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong太巴塱, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
